languages.text: "Да. Инстинкт не обманул меня, но сердце желало надежды на иное".
"Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."
languages.original_text: "Да. Инстинкт не обманул меня, но сердце желало надежды на иное".

traits.locale_text: "Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."
"Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."
"Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."
"Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."

languages.text: “是啊，我的直觉并没有出错，可我的心依然不肯放弃希望。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我的直觉并没有出错，可我的心依然不肯放弃希望。”

languages.text: 「ああ。直感では分かっていたが、心ではやはり希望を求めてたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ。直感では分かっていたが、心ではやはり希望を求めてたんだ」

languages.text: «Así es. Mis instintos estaban en lo cierto, pero mi corazón quería albergar esperanza de todos modos».
languages.original_text: "Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Mis instintos estaban en lo cierto, pero mi corazón quería albergar esperanza de todos modos».

languages.text: « Oui. Mon instinct ne m'a pas trompé, mais une lueur d'espoir subsistait malgré tout dans mon cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Mon instinct ne m'a pas trompé, mais une lueur d'espoir subsistait malgré tout dans mon cœur. »

languages.text: "Ja. Meine Instinkte haben mich nicht getrogen, aber dennoch sehnte sich mein Herz nach Hoffnung."
languages.original_text: "Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Meine Instinkte haben mich nicht getrogen, aber dennoch sehnte sich mein Herz nach Hoffnung."

languages.text: "Evet. İçgüdülerim beni yanıltmadı ama yüreğimdeki umut da hiç sönmemişti."
languages.original_text: "Yes. My instincts did not fail me, but my heart yearned for hope all the same."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. İçgüdülerim beni yanıltmadı ama yüreğimdeki umut da hiç sönmemişti."
